title: Life in balance: Ancient Andean scales illuminated by new research
description: New research from the University of St Andrews has discovered how Incas used Andean balance scales and ancient string knot writing known as "khipus," in association with sacred, animate landscapes.

title: Mystery owner of ancient foot found in Africa identified, scientists say
description: The discovery could cast some doubt on the status of Lucy's species as the direct ancestor of Homo sapiens.

title: Millenary Lights on Ancient Orvieto

title: Discovery of ancient statues rewrites prehistoric human history
